alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston; Wyoming Black Hills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued December 18 at 1:24AM MST until December 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills as low as 50 below zero, coldest Wednesday night. * WHERE...Portions of southwestern South Dakota, the Black Hills, and northeast Wyoming. * WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: A wind chill watch means dangerously low wind chill values are possible due to the combination of very cold air and wind.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Crook; Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Western Crook; Weston; Wyoming Black Hills
